title: is there a Lucene that can be used on Android devices
description: we are implement lucene on Android devices, and currently we have some issues on compileing lucene under Android enviroument, So we are wondering Lucene will release a version that can follow latest version based on Android enviroument?

comments.content:
This is not the best place to ask this question. You want to ask that on lucene-dev mailing list. This one is used to report issues/request specific features against the source code.

I suspect the answer will be 'no', but you will get a much better depth of discussion on the mailing list.
comments.author: Alexandre Rafalovitch

comments.content: thanks for your answer, could you give me an link to mailing list? i cant find it anywhere.
comments.author: huawei_xu
